title.rendered: Aftermaths of the northeastern Japan magnitude 7.5 earthquake

image_meta.caption: HACHINOHE (Japan), 09/12/2025.- A shrine torii gate collapsed following a strong quake in Hachinohe, Aomori prefecture, northeastern Japan, 09 December 2025. A powerful quake with a magnitude of 7.5 hit northeastern Japan late 08 December 2025, triggering tsunami warnings in coastal areas of northeast Japan and Hokkaido. More than 30 people had been injured in the late-night earthquake. (Terremoto/sismo, Japón) EFE/EPA/JIJI PRESS JAPAN OUT EDITORIAL USE ONLY
image_meta.title: Aftermaths of the northeastern Japan magnitude 7.5 earthquake

title.rendered: Displaced Palestinians seek shelter in Gaza City ruins amid fragile ceasefire

caption.rendered: Cerca de 1,9 millones de personas en Gaza, casi el 90% de la población, han sido desplazadas por los ataques israelíes. Foto EFE

image_meta.caption: Gaza City (-), 08/12/2025.- Internally displaced Palestinians walk among the ruins of destroyed buildings in the Al Sheikh Radwan neighborhood of Gaza City, Gaza Strip, 08 December 2025, amid a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. Around 1.9 million people in Gaza, nearly 90 percent of the population, have been displaced since the Israel-Hamas conflict began in October 2023, according to the UN. EFE/EPA/MOHAMMED SABER
